room_title: Escape room "Captain Spoopy Bones and the Magnificent Quest for some Other Pirate's Treasure" by Doldrick's Escape Room
room_description:
Raise the anchor and set sail with Captain Spoopy Bones in this lighthearted tale of nautical nonsense! Navigate the treacherous waters aboard the Captain’s massive ship, and race against time in this grand adventure on the high seas. With teamwork, determination, and a little bit of luck, the players will uncover the secret of Captain Spoopy Bones and the magnificent quest for some other pirate’s treasure!
This escape game relies heavily on team communication! Your quest begins with your team separated into two groups. How quickly you reunite depends on how well your team communicates! Captain Spoopy Bones is a very large game that is designed for big groups and offers plenty of puzzles! This game is incredibly immersive and recommended for players that are up for the challenge!
